chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 Pro has the above issue: When can I expect my package? As forecasted delivery date was last specified as 10.5. Thank you! Thanks again for your help,

Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
When can I count on my package? As a delivery date, the latest one specified was May 10th.
Thank you!

Thanks for your help,

Dear ecomobile

an investigation has been opened by UPS have you opened it?

Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are checking with our logistics partner about the investigation and status of the parcel. We would update you as soon as we receive a reply. 

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

Do you have anything new?

Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer, thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Hello, 

I have released all documents to you.

I kindly ask you to start an investigation.

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We opened an investigation with the carrier. Thank you for providing the necessary documents.

Regards,
SY

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded within 1 business day. 

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Fatma, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

May we confirm if the customer is refunded?

Regards,
SY
